prompt: Create a blog website and use sample blog posts and images.
refinedPrompt: Create a blog website with a clean and modern design. Include a homepage featuring the latest blog posts, an about page with information about the blog's purpose and author, and individual blog post pages with full articles and related images. Implement a search functionality and categories for easy navigation. Use sample blog posts covering various topics such as technology, lifestyle, and travel, along with relevant high-quality images to enhance the visual appeal. Ensure the website is responsive and optimized for different devices and screen sizes. Include social media sharing options for each blog post and a newsletter subscription form to engage readers.
